column4: can anyone tell me how are the packages kept by apt installed?
so what? it doesn't upgrade them because it might think they are not ready to be upgraded or not needed?
did you get -- maybe an error?
... it doesnt neither for me now in hoary
you will have to disable the SoundServer in gnome.
yea it didn't for me either
have you checked if the real player configuring options support esd?
i simply ran realplay and nothing happend... after I stopped esd, and ran realplay it wokred
System -> Settings -> Audio settings. [ ]  Start sound deamon | (uncheck), start RealPlay
you might want to play with the AUDIO=... flag for RealPlayer
looks like it would support somethin like AUDIO=/dev/null
